wikitext.*:
'''Chester N. Scoville''', Ph. D., is a lecturer at the Department of English of the [[wikipedia:University of Toronto Mississauga|University of Toronto Mississauga]], and a member of the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

* [[2005]]: ''[[Tolkien's Modern Middle Ages]]''

** "Estate"
** "Hobbit, The" 
** "Leeds"
** "Road Goes Ever On, The"
** "Whitby"
